fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the Citibank logo

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder at Citibank

fields.name: client_number
fields.description: Client number assigned to the account holder by Citibank

fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.description: Date of birth of the account holder

fields.name: customer_account_number
fields.description: Account number of the customer at Citibank

fields.name: customer_iban
fields.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the customer at Citibank

fields.name: customer_bank_name
fields.description: Name of the bank where the account is held (Citibank in this case)

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period for which the statement covers

fields.name: statement_date
fields.description: Date on which the statement was generated

fields.name: opening_balance_debit
fields.description: Opening balance in debit for this account

fields.name: opening_balance_credit
fields.description: Opening balance in credit for this account

fields.name: opening_balance
fields.description: Total opening balance for this account

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date on which the transaction was processed

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description of the transaction made on the account

fields.name: transaction.debit
fields.description: Amount debited from this account for a transaction

fields.name: transaction.credit
fields.description: Amount credited to this account for a transaction

fields.name: transaction.balance
fields.description: Balance of the account after the transaction

fields.name: total_debit
fields.description: Total amount debited from this account over the statement period

fields.name: total_credit
fields.description: Total amount credited to this account over the statement period

fields.name: total
fields.description: Net total balance of the account after all transactions for the statement period
